targets.query: SELECT mean("avg") FROM "inputs" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$Device$/ AND "label" =~ /^$label$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "label", "unit" fill(null)

list.name: Device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  from deviceinfo with KEY=device

list.label: Input
list.name: label
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  from inputs with KEY=label where "device" =~ /^$Device$/
